reviewText: I bought this for my four year old niece with some fairy wings.  She loved it and would not take it off until bedtime.  It is nice fabric and fit her perfectly!

I bought this tutu for my granddaughter. She loves wearing tutus and I liked the variety of colors available. The price is reasonable and if it gets damaged I'm happy knowing she had joy hours of enjoyment!

My daughter has worn this skirt almost every day since she received it and it's even been through the washer along with the other clothes.  It's amazing quality!  She fits a 4T and it's just above her knee, and has a little bit of growing room, although I'm not so sure as much as others are saying.  But considering how often she wears it, I'm not worried! ;)

I ordered this purple tutu for my daughter's first birthday. It was so fun and cute! It was obviously a little big on her because she was only a year old, but the elastic worked well enough and she will be able to wear it for many more birthdays to come. It came to her feet like a dress but didn't drag or trip her at all. I was able to wash it on a regular cycle (I just put it in a lingerie bag to be safe) and tumbled it on low. Great & fun item!
I bought this Tutu for my 7 year old daughters Diva party. She loved it and it looked sooo cute on!It is not flimsy at all a great value for the price. I would buy more in different colors!

We originally bought this for my daughter's Halloween costume and it was as bright, cute and fluffy as it looks in the picture. (Once you fluff if out of the package.) It's been a constant favorite of my daughter ever since.  She's worn it for parties and play time.  It's been stuffed in toy-boxes and left on floor and it is still holding up perfectly.  The waistband is stretchy enough to fit a larger child but still stays snug on a 4 yr old (now 5). Great value for the price.
Tutus were great for holiday dance show and what we needed them for. They were shipped very quickly and came very neat, no need to steam them. Fits younger girls and small waisted teens.

My granddaughter wears a tutu just about every day.  I like this one because it's shaped just right and is PLAIN.  Some of the ones I see in the stores are hideous, so gaudy.  heh, although she wears them just as proudly. I sent this one to her for her birthday and saw her on skype dancing and twirling.  Mission accomplished.
great tutu for my daughter to play dress up in. she loves this and will stay in it most of the day haha. it is not too tight and not too short great for playing and twirling.
We bought this for our two and a half year old daughter for Valentines Day. Its a lot thinner then I thought, but very cute. No cleaning instructions.

I bought this for my 7 year old daughter. It's a nice red tutu but it's not what I wanted. It was a little too short for my taste and I'm not sure if I like the way it fits her. I haven't decided if I wanna use it or not. :-(
summary: It's nice, but not what I wanted.

reviewText: Item was exactly what I was looking for.  Girls loved their Christmas gift !. . .  would buy again from this vendor.

Absolutely love this tutu. Fit my little girl perfectly (she's a size 4t) Arrived super quick - just in time for a Halloween party & just in time to replace a "no-show" costume. It ended being a huge hit & I actually ended up liking it even more than my original purchase.

I was pleasantly suprised when the package arrived - high quality craftsmanship, enough layers of tuling to really fluff and keep what is underneath covered.  The price was a steal - I will definately purchase this line in the future for gifts.

I got this for my daughter who is now 2 years and 4 months old. Her weight is in the lower 25th percentile, but she is tall for her age. This tutu fit her well on the waist, and the length came to her knees, which was perfect. The color is very pretty and the waist band is sewed well. My daughter specifically wanted a blue tutu, and this was the best deal I found in the small size and Prime eligible.

We bought this for our 2 year old and she LOVES the color. The tutu is very full on her and she loves how it flies when she twirls. It has a bright satin band with the elastic underneath, which helps the elastic not annoy her sensitive skin.Our daughter is very small so I was afraid it might be to big, but it stays up and isn't to long on her!
summary: perfect - even for small 2 yr old

reviewText: This was a good purchase, seems to be well made and also fuller than I had anticipated - good gift to add to alreadypurchased  Christmas gifts for grand daughter :)
I bought a white tutu. My 4 year old daughter loves it. It looks very beautiful and graceful on her.
I was very impressed with the tutus. Very good quality. Excellent price! .....and the girls absolutely loved them! They looked fabulous!
Purchased this tutu for my granddaughter's first birthday.  It fit nicely with room to grow in.  I'm very please with it and will purchase more in varying colors in the future.
Bought this for my 3 1/2 yo daughter for Christmas for dress up. She loves it! Good quality. Very poofy, frilly and girly!

I was impressed when I first opened the package.  Very cute!  However, either it is not well made or my toddler is extra hard on it because it has unraveled in a short amount of time.  I would not buy this again.

I just bought this for a halloween costume and it got to my house within 4 days!! I was very happy about that! I took a star down because it is a LITTLE bit see through but not very much. It very good for ages 5-12

while i understand i should pay more attention to product description. i was in a hurry online shopping and searched multiple tutus for 2 year old. I saw this picture and assumed it came with all of them. and when i received one i had to go back and read that it was only the lavender. mostly my fault but maybe product pic should only show the one color you are choosing..
I got this tutu for for halloween for my baby girl and she loved it. It arrived fast and in perfect condition!
Tutu fits a little tight and the quality is not the best. Beautiful color though. I would not purchase again.

Received the red tutu late, I needed it to accessorize a Halloween costume.  My 6yr.old loved it though, she wore it immediately and wouldn't take it off.  She wore it with a pair of leggings and a leopard tank top.  It is really cute.

I got this in pink and white for a slender 2 year old. It is a little on the loose side, but it does stay on. While my little girl is a bit of a tomboy, as she is overshadowed by 5 older brothers, she does enjoy wearing this over her jeggings and running around and playing. Her playdates, two who are closer to 3, are madly in love with the tutus--it's a good thing we only have one of them at a time. I think that it would ideally fit a 3 or 4 year old without any stretch, but could fit kids possibly up to the age of twelve with the amount of stretch it has. The elastic has very nice give and the layers of tulle are very nicely proportioned and soft. After throwing it in the wash, the edges can curl a little with minimal fray--maybe I could have put it on a gentler cycle, but it looks pretty much lithe same. I really like the way the elastic is sewn in. The satin edge is part of the tulle fabric, not sewn on, and the elastic is enclosed between the layers of the satin edge, making it seem pretty secure. I have made my own tutus, but they never looked as nice or were so soft.
good price and just what I wanted. My granddaughters have thoroughly enjoyed them. They play with them nearly every day.
Delievered quickly.  Really cute and better quality than I expected considering the reasonable price.  I would recommend this tutu to others.

Pefect!! My 4 year old boy loves wearing it. We bought it for a parade where we were all going to be water fairies and he alternates between that and being the best butterfly ever!! Color is gorgeous, cleans up well after food spills and waistband seems very hearty! Can also double as a fun headcovering for adults.
Full and well stitched.  This tutu is a beautiful purple color that looks just like the picture.  It looks just adorable on our little fairy.
I bought this for a 4-5 year old for Christmas for dressing up. It was a big hit. She loved it
It fits my daughter great and serves it's purpose wonderfully! She wears it all the time! I would recommend this skirt.

This was a gift for a two year old and a five year old.  The girls squealed upon opening the box, they grabbed the tutus, put them on, and wore them the rest of the day.  The tutus seem to be well made, and can stand up to handling by little princesses.  I recommend these tutus.
I bought this for my baby cousin and she never had a tutu before this was a great first tutu and fit perfect according to the size we got.
This was perfect for my son's 4 year old friend for her birthday.  Perfect for dress up or to wear over shorts or pants.  Price point was perfect too!
